37  TransactionManager::TransactionManager()
38  {
39  if (NULL == (tm = xta_transaction_manager_new()))
40  throw Exception(LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT,
41  "xta_transaction_manager_new");
42  };
43 
44  TransactionManager::~TransactionManager()
45  {
46  xta_transaction_manager_delete(tm);
47  tm = NULL;
48  };
49 
50  Transaction TransactionManager::createTransaction()
51  {
52  xta_transaction_t *tx = NULL;
53  if (NULL == (tx = xta_transaction_manager_create_transaction(tm)))
54  throw Exception(LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT,
55  "xta_transaction_manager_create_transaction");
56  Transaction t(tx);
57  return t;
58  };
59 
60 }
